arts.ttl: Bournemouth vs. Newcastle – Eddie Howe: Pre-Match Press Conference
arts.sum: Bournemouth will look to maintain their strong early-season form when they host Newcastle United on Sunday. The Cherries sit fourth in the table after three wins from four, while Eddie Howe’s Magpies are still searching for consistency. Andoni Iraola’s team has responded superbly since their opening defeat at still-undefeated Liverpool, beating Wolves, Tottenham, and Brighton […]

arts.ttl: Bournemouth vs Newcastle United – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: A meeting between two sides in contrasting form takes place at the Vitality Stadium on Sunday, as Bournemouth host Newcastle United. The Cherries are one of the league’s in-form teams, with a three-match winning streak propelling them into the top four, while the visitors are struggling for consistency and are coming off a draining midweek […] The post Bournemouth vs Newcastle United – Match preview and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Bournemouth vs Newcastle United – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Bournemouth welcome Newcastle to the Vitality Stadium on Sunday in superb form, riding a three-match winning streak that has lifted them into the Premier League’s top four. Andoni Iraola’s side is full of confidence and will be aiming to win a fourth successive top-flight game for the first time since 2018. arts.ttl: Newcastle United XI vs Bournemouth – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Eddie Howe takes his Newcastle United side to the south coast on Sunday to face a formidable Bournemouth team. The Magpies must quickly overcome the physical and mental toll of a draining midweek Champions League defeat to Barcelona as they prepare to take on one of the Premier League‘s most in-form teams. arts.ttl: Andoni Iraola indicates the strength of his midfield through a selection ‘headache’ for Newcastle
arts.sum: Bafode is also training well - I wouldn't say he is 100% but I would expect him to also be available." The midfield unit is a big strength for Newcastle United, but with a week of rest and a strong roster, Bournemouth are giving the "best headaches" to Andoni Iraola as to how he handles this challenge.
